name: High Volatility Regime
description: Volatile market with large price swings. Tests GARCH behavior in high volatility environment and regime classification.

input.comment: Generated by generateGARCH_HighVolatility() - 200 returns with σ ≈ 0.03 (3% daily)

volatilityZScore.comment: Should be > 1 compared to normal volatility

forecastVolatility.comment: 5-step forecast should stay near current high level

notes: High volatility regime (3x normal). Classification should detect HIGH or EXTREME based on historical comparison. z-score > 1 indicates significantly elevated volatility.
